resources.string: The request was invalid or cannot be otherwise served. An accompanying error message will explain further. In API v1.1, requests without authentication are considered invalid and will yield this response.
Authentication credentials were missing or incorrect.
The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed.
The URI requested is invalid or the resource requested, such as a user, does not exists.
TheRiceBag is down or being upgraded.
Document uploads not allowed for this user
No handler for this type of file
Something went wrong. Please try again later
